item.title: Son of Norway's crown princess holds back tears giving evidence at rape trial
item.description: Marius Borg HÃ¸iby gives evidence after the first woman he is alleged to have raped told the court she believed she had been drugged.

item.title: Thousands without power in freezing Ukraine as renewed Russian strikes continue
item.description: Ukraine's leader says regions including Kyiv and Kharkiv are among those suffering the most from blackouts as a result of recent attacks.

item.title: Fears of new arms race as US-Russia nuclear weapons treaty due to expire
item.description: The New Start treaty has limited the number of deployed strategic nuclear warheads for both countries.

item.title: Leader of South Africa's second largest party to step down
item.description: The surprise move may threaten the stability of the coalition government of which the DA is a key partner.

item.title: Israeli strikes kill 20 in Gaza, hospitals say, after soldier wounded by gunfire
item.description: Hospitals say several children were among those killed in strikes that Israel's military says it launched after a gun attack on its troops.
